author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

[Needs https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9612](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9943)

Pythia 8.315 requires
* `ParticleDecays:allowPhotonRadiation` -> `HadronLevel:QED`

#### PR validation:

```
Pass    6s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareIdentical
Pass    8s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareExternal
Pass   12s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareExternalStreams
Pass   33s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8ConcurrentGeneratorFilter
Pass   26s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/TestGeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterface_bplus
Pass   14s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/testGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceTP
Pass   28s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/TestGeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterface_external_bplus
Pass   72s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/GeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterfaceTest
Pass  870s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2016preVFP
Pass  901s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2017
Pass  965s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2016postVFP
Pass 1529s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2018                                                                                         
Pass 1619s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2022postEE
>> Test sequence completed for CMSSW CMSSW_15_1_X_2025-06-25-2300  
```
title: Modifications for Pythia 8.315
